title: Wild salmon with pink peppercorn sauce
ingredients: ['For the poaching stock', '250ml rosé wine', '125ml water', '4 slices lemon', '1 carrot, peeled and coarsely chopped', '1 teaspoon white peppercorns (whole)', '1 blade mace', '½ vanilla pod, sliced down centre (optional)', 'For the salmon', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '25g finely chopped shallots', '4 (200g) salmon fillets', '¼ teaspoon sea salt', '¼ teaspoon coarsely milled black pepper', '100ml double cream', '1 tablespoon pink peppercorns, lightly crushed']
